admin_router.description: A routing module that determines which gate receives which requests relating to use of the admin tools.

game_router.description: A routing module that determines which gate receives requests for events relating to in-game play.

log_router.description: A router that directs requests to logging and monitoring gates.

triggers_router.description: A router that determines what gates to call based on triggered service activity associated with multi-step event chain service paths.
